column4: hi, i'm trying to install stuff bit it doesn't make sense. If I can't get something by apt-get, I download the source, but then ./configure always fails, ive tried on about ten things
it says things like gtk, gcc, etc aren't there, and they are
what do you want to install
you do not need to download anything for this please see https://help.ubuntu.com/8.04/add-applications/C/index.html
